Title: The Screwfly Solution
Plot: Deadly virus infects the nation, that turns men into psychotic killers who attack every woman they see. A housewife and her daughter try to survive this madness.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Graphic violence, sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Jason Priestley, Elliott Gould, Brenna O'Brien, Kerry Norton, Linda Darlow, William Taylor, Nelson Carter Leis
